Name: Crash Forts 2
About the game: Crash Forts 2 is a continuation of an exciting puzzle about physics and destruction. You have to destroy various structures again with the help of tools. In the game you will find a lot of new exciting and exciting levels of varying difficulty. Control your hammer and pickaxe and destroy everything in your path! There are a lot of unique buildings waiting for you in the game, so destroy them all! Features of the game: - Many levels - Complete destruction of objects - Physics - Colorful graphics
